column5: Was such a beauty afternoon. I was not going to waste the evening sitting indoors. Off Casey and I went to a nice little spot. With the full moon coming on, the crappie were hungry. A couple of samples   They were in real shallow. Less than 2' of water for the most part.
Right on ! The crappie bite here seems to have died off. Should keep the shallow thing in mind.
Nice catch, great way to spend part of the day,,,,outdoors, thanks for the pics.
They were a lot hungrier tonight.
